attributes.action: Exempt National Insurance Contributions from the date of becoming a pensioner
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
At presen you have no exemption unless you have reached retirement age BEFORE the start of the financial year.
If you reach retirement age just ONE day into the financial year, you MUST pay NI on your earnings- IS THAT FAIR?
PENSIONERS UNITE!!!!!!!!!!
